H0.text: Gravity and wind direction are both terms used to describe the weather.

H1.text: Precipitation and runoff are terms used to describe the weather.

H2.text: Groundwater and erosion are both terms used to describe the weather.

H3.text: Air temperature and wind speed are terms both used to describe the weather.

A4.text: Air temperature is measured at meteorological observatories and weather stations.

A5.text: The size of ground-level atmospheric temperature ranges depends on the regime of winds (intensity, duration, variation, temperature, etc.).
